def multiplyPolynomials(p1, p2):
    len_a=len(p1)
    len_b=len(p2)
    result=[]
    result_len=len_a+len_b-1
    
    for i in range(result_len):
        result.append(0)
        
    for i in range(len_a):
        for j in range(len_b):
            result[i+j]+=p1[i]*p2[j]
    return result
